summary: REQ-1, REQ-3, and REQ-4 appear implemented via new hash routing utilities/hook plus new AdminAccessBlocked and NotFound pages, and App.tsx switching views by parsed hash routes. REQ-2 (updating all in-app navigation controls to set the URL hash) is not clearly evidenced in the diff summary beyond App-level navigation helpers; Header/Footer and other navigational transitions are not shown as updated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update all in-app navigation that currently uses setCurrentView(...) (Header/Footer buttons and any other view transitions) to also update the URL hash to the corresponding route so users can bookmark/share pages; browser Back/Forward should move between views correctly.
missing_requirements.reason: While App.tsx introduces navigateToRoute(...) helpers and useHashRoute() supports hashchange events, the diff summary does not show modifications to Header/Footer (or other components) to ensure their navigation controls actually update window.location.hash instead of in-memory state. The modified Header/Footer files are only mentioned in a high-level summary file, not as actual diffs, so implementation evidence is insufficient.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin access-blocked screen includes special-case login error handling that clears the React Query cache and retries login when the error message is 'User is already authenticated'.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 requires an on-page blocked-access message with Home and Login actions; it does not request query cache clearing or retry login logic tied to a specific error string.
